GSD.product_version: versions from v4.1 to before v5.10.120
GSD.description:
netfilter: nf_tables: disallow non-stateful expression in sets earlier

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.120 by commit ea62d169b6e731e0b54abda1d692406f6bc6a696, it was introduced in version v4.1 by commit 0b2d8a7b638b5034d2d68f6add8af94daaa1d4cd. For more details please see the references link.
